question: Save Heart initiative is an__:
option1: An initiative of Directorate Health Services Kashmir to equip medical professionals working in remote areas with skill to treat patients with heart disease in a better way.
option2: An initiative of the health department of Karnataka to provide green corridor to ensure ease of heart transportation for transplantations.
option3: An initiative of union ministry of health to create greater awareness about the heart diseases.
option4: An initiative of government of Tamil Nadu to develop Tamil Nadu as hub for treatment for heart related ailments.
answer: An initiative of Directorate Health Services Kashmir to equip medical professionals working in remote areas with skill to treat patients with heart disease in a better way.
explanation: Under the Save heart initiative the doctors and other staff in Kashmir are trainedÂ in multi level basic life support system, emergency room trauma course, and advance cardiac life support. Under this initiative only this winter the state has been able to save more than 250 human lives or patients who suffered cardiac attacks in remote parts of Kashmir. [Source]
